name: scramble (itch) (flaslam)
description:
Local multiplayer brawler in a forest.

2-4 players.

Controls:

Keyboard:

  • WASD for movement
  • J to attack, K to jump, L to dash
  • K to select, return/enter to pause
  • ESC to quit

Gamepad (DS4/XBONE/Joy-Con):

  • Left analog stick for movement
  • Square to attack, Cross to jump, Circle to dash
  • Cross to select, Options to pause
